title: Detention Pregnancy Tracker
description: A confidential tool developed by the Women's Refugee Commission to collect real-time reports on the treatment and conditions of pregnant, postpartum, and nursing women in U.S. immigration detention.
shortDescription: Real-time tracking system for women's conditions in ICE detention facilities.
challenge: Creating a secure, confidential platform to collect sensitive data about detention conditions while ensuring user privacy and data integrity.
solution: Developed a robust web application with encrypted data collection, real-time reporting capabilities, and secure access controls for healthcare providers and advocates.

title: ICE Detention Dashboard
description: A comprehensive data visualization platform providing insights into U.S. immigration detention patterns, facility capacities, and demographic trends.
shortDescription: Interactive dashboard for immigration detention data analysis.
challenge: Transforming complex detention data into accessible, interactive visualizations for researchers and policymakers.
solution: Built an intuitive dashboard with dynamic charts, filtering capabilities, and export functions for detailed analysis.

title: Immigration Professor Blog Platform
description: A modern, responsive blog platform designed for academic researchers to share immigration policy insights and research findings.
shortDescription: Academic blog platform for immigration research dissemination.
challenge: Creating a professional platform that bridges academic research with public discourse on immigration policy.
solution: Developed a content management system with SEO optimization, social sharing, and responsive design for academic content distribution.

title: Immigration Enforcement Analytics
description: Advanced analytics platform tracking immigration enforcement activities, policy impacts, and regional variations across the United States.
shortDescription: Analytics platform for immigration enforcement data.
challenge: Processing and visualizing large datasets of enforcement actions to identify patterns and policy effectiveness.
solution: Created a scalable analytics platform with real-time data processing, predictive modeling, and interactive reporting tools.
